snippet: Federal land officials on Tuesday announced new restrictions on rope-swinging from giant natural rock arches in the desert canyonlands outside Moab.
abstract: Bureau of Land Management announces new restrictions on rope-swinging from rock arches in desert canyonlands outside Moab, Utah.
lead_paragraph: Federal land officials on Tuesday announced new restrictions on rope-swinging from giant natural rock arches in the desert canyonlands outside Moab.

headline.main: Utah: Rope-Swinging on Rock Arches Is Banned
headline.print_headline: Utah: Rope-Swinging on Rock Arches Is Banned
